nodes.text: The Vault security contingent was a security group of stormtroopers of the Galactic Empire that served within the Scarif Deployment. They were assigned to provide security for the Scarif vault in the Citadel Tower, and during the Battle of Scarif, were deployed once the Imperial forces were received a DefStat Three security alert in response to a Rebel Alliance breach. When they arrived, they engaged in a firefight with the rebel droid, K-2SO, and many troopers were killed before they managed to destroy the droid.
